concept.title: Things to Remember (Cautions)
concept.shortdesc: Additonal cautions when operating and handling the GAME BOY.

ol.li:
Insert Game Pak firmly but take care not to exert undue force on the GAME BOY body.
Keep Game Paks stored in their cases for thei protection when not in use.
Before inserting and removing Game Pak, make sure that the power is OFF. (Do not unneccisarily turn the power ON and OFF. As this will shorten the life of your batteries.)
Insert only NINTENDO GAME BOY Game Paks into the Game Pak slot.

Don't touch the terminals and connectors on the FAME BOY bosy or Game Pak. Take special care in preventing dust from getting inside the Game Pak slot. Inspect the GAME PAK connector for foreign material before inserting it into the Game Pak slot.
Never dissassemble or attempt repair to the GAME BOY and its accessories. This will void your warranty.

Precision electrical parrts are used in the GAME BOY.
Dont subject the GAME BOY to strong shock by striking or dropping it,
